All About Consumers

Consumers are the backbone of Zype’s Subscription Service. Consumers, with a plan, create a subscription. The Zype Platform supports Stripe for credit card processing of consumers.

Connecting Stripe
Creating a Consumer
Getting a Consumer's Details
Removing a Consumer

Connecting Stripe

Before creating a consumer, you will need to link your Stripe Account to the Zype Platform. In the Zype Platform, navigate to settings and enter your Stripe Secret Key. Your Stripe Secret Key can be found under your Stripe account settings.

Creating a Consumer

You will need to use our API to create consumers.

Getting a Consumer’s Details

You can use the Zype Platform to get details about a consumer. To get a consumer’s details, go to the consumers page and click on the appropriate consumer. Information includes a consumer’s email and his or her subscriptions.

Removing a Consumer

You can remove a consumer from the Zype Platform. To do so, navigate to the consumers’ page and click on the red delete button for the appropriate consumer.

Note, deleting a consumer will also cancel all of his or her subscriptions.
